鎚字的基本解释

鎚
chuí
同“锤”②鎚④。

鎚字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chuí］
［《廣韻》直垂切，平支，澄。］
［《廣韻》馳僞切，去真，澄。］
“锤1”的繁体字。亦作“鎚1”。
(1)重量单位。其重若干，说法不一。
(2)亦作“鎚”。秤砣。
(3)亦作“鎚”。锤子；榔头。
(4)亦作“鎚”。古兵器之一，顶端有金属球形重物，用以打击。
(5)亦作“鎚”。锻打；敲击。
(6)锤形物。
(7)通“垂”。下垂；挂。
(8)通“垂”。半。

鎚字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鎚； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1317第12
【廣韻】【正韻】直追切【集韻】【韻會】傳追切，?音椎。【玉篇】鐵鎚也。【廣韻】金鎚。【抱朴子·僊藥卷】以鐵鎚鍛其數千下。　又【廣韻】權也。【正韻】與錘同。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?都回切，音磓。【廣韻】治玉。【集韻】鍛也。　又【廣韻】直類切【集韻】馳僞切，?音墜。好銅半熟也。

鎚字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鎚字的起名意思

暂无。

hammer
Basic explanation of words
hammer
chuí
Same as "hammer"②hammer④.
hammer
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chuí］
["Guangyun" cut straight down, flat branch, clear. ]
["Guangyun" cuts falsely, goes to the real and clears. ]
The traditional characters of "锤1". Also known as "hammer 1".
(1) Weight unit. It's a little bit heavy, but there are different opinions.
(2) Also known as "hammer". Weights.
(3) Also known as "hammer". Hammer
(4) Also known as "hammer". One of the ancient weapons, with a metal spherical weight on the top for combat.
(5) Also known as "hammer". Forging; percussion.
(6) Hammer-shaped objects.
(7) Through "vertical". Droop; hang.
(8) Through "vertical". half.
hammer

[Guang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Straight-up cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Club] Passed and cut,? Tone vertebra. [Jade articles] Hammer also. [Guang Yun] Golden Hammer. [Baopuzi·Xianyao Volume] Forged thousands of times with a hammer.　[Guang Yun] Quan Ye. 【Zheng Yun】Same as hammer.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? All cut back, Yin Deng. [Guangyun] Treating jade. [Ji Yun] Forging also.　[Guangyun] Straight cut [Jiyun] False cut, sound drop. Good copper half-cooked too.
